title: Oven baked kedgeree
ingredients: ['400g basmati rice', '500g undyed smoked haddock, cooked and flaked', 'juice of 1 large lemon', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '1 generous pinch cayenne pepper', '300ml single cream', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons brown breadcrumbs', '3 hard boiled eggs, quartered', '25g unsalted butter, melted', 'mozzarella cheese (optional)']
